fixes.name: Filter
fixes.dax_expression: 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Category] = SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As]) && 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type] = SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As])
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]), converted AND to &&, and qualified row fields with the table name 'Data (Complaint Line)'. The expression returns true when both category and type match the selected parameter values.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
